body_html: FWIW, I ran this code on ImageNet, batch size 4096, the dataset is on SSD, with 12 workers it takes ~1 minute to load the first batch in 0.4.0. With this PR it is almost immediate (<1s).
body_text: FWIW, I ran this code on ImageNet, batch size 4096, the dataset is on SSD, with 12 workers it takes ~1 minute to load the first batch in 0.4.0. With this PR it is almost immediate (<1s).
